superkaramba_theme.name: Install Easy Monitor
superkaramba_theme.description: Easy Monitor is set of SuperKaramba themes and bash scripts. Can display infos about your: distro, procesor, memory, disk usage, clock, network speed... and even do many: administrative, configuration, installation and backup tasks
superkaramba_theme.author: Leszek Ostachowski (easy.monitor.theme@gmail.com) based on Crystal Monitor by Mihael Simonic
